name: Forgotten One
senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 90 ft., passive Perception 13

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The forgotten one’s spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The forgotten one can innately cast the following, requiring no material components. * At will: blur

traits.name: Environmental Awareness
traits.desc: The very earth speaks to a forgotten one. It cannot be surprised.

traits.name: Poison Use
traits.desc: Forgotten Ones are skilled in the use of poison.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
